name: Flat Dumbbell Bench Press
cues: Lie flat on a bench with feet planted and dumbbells held over your chest
Lower the dumbbells slowly to your chest, keeping elbows at about a 45Â° angle
Press up powerfully without locking out your elbows
Brace your core and retract your shoulder blades throughout the movement
Use a spotter if lifting heavy
Adjust weight to maintain good form
Keep wrists straight and avoid letting them bend backward
